Title: With you in charge, I'm at ease. Presented to the heads of families of intellectual youth who have been sent up the mountains, down the countryside
Publisher: Beijingshi geming weiyuanhui (北京市革命委员会)
Notes: "With you in charge, I am at ease", Mao writes on a piece of paper that he hands over to Hua Guofeng. Hua uses this document - which may or may not be authentic - to prove Mao really appointed him as successor.
Theme: Mao and Hua: 'With you in charge, I'm at ease'
